cards.title: Aged to Perfection!
cards.centerfold: Happy Birthday, my friend! Remember, age is just a number— a really high one in your case! But don’t worry, with all those candles on your cake, we’ll have enough heat to start a small bonfire!
cards.back: Cheers to many more hilarious adventures!
cards.artistInspiration: vibrant neo-expressionist style with ornate floral backgrounds and bold color fields
